Reviews.Content: visited hotel wife intially hesitant reviews happy experience booked 2 days visting dubai 2 weeks eventually extending stay hotel 2 weeks loved evey bit especially casa de goa dinner day casa de goa heard recently management changes management restaurant changed upside prefect visit hotel casa de goa
